name: W. Crawford MURDOCK, Appellant, v. Larry S. SHAFFNER, Appellee

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: W. Crawford MURDOCK, Appellant, v. Larry S. SHAFFNER, Appellee.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John J. Krafsig, Jr., Harrisburg, for appellant.
McNees, Wallace & Nurick, G. Thomas Miller, David E. Lehman, Harrisburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
388 A.2d 682
W. Crawford MURDOCK, Appellant, v. Larry S. SHAFFNER, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 4, 1978.
Decided July 14, 1978.
John J. Krafsig, Jr., Harrisburg, for appellant.
McNees, Wallace & Nurick, G. Thomas Miller, David E. Lehman, Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
